body_html: @themightyoarfish Please revert the submodule change. Moreover, it might be good to mention that reproducibility is not guaranteed across versions and/or architectures. E.g., a RNG on CUDA definitely behaves different than the RNG on CPU even though they use same seed; and when we optimize a sampling kernel in a release, the generated numbers might be different (although distribution is the same).

body: @themightyoarfish Please revert the submodule change. Moreover, it might be good to mention that reproducibility is not guaranteed across versions and/or architectures. E.g., a RNG on CUDA definitely behaves different than the RNG on CPU even though they use same seed; and when we optimize a sampling kernel in a release, the generated numbers might be different (although distribution is the same).
